thread.title: WPP Board Weighs Leadership Contingency Plan Should CEO Sorrell Leave

author: Nick Kostov
title: WPP Board Weighs Leadership Contingency Plan Should CEO Sorrell Leave
text:
The board of WPP PLC is weighing contingency plans in the event Chief Executive Martin Sorrell leaves the company, people familiar with the matter said, as the advertising giantâ€™s longtime leader deals with an allegation of misconduct.
If Mr. Sorrell departs, the board is considering tapping WPP veterans Mark Read and Andrew Scott to be co-CEOs, the people said. The appointments would likely be on an interim basis while a search is conducted, one of the people said.
